ComicInfo.Title: Our Little Secret; Web Of Deceit; Hidden Talent; Power: What's It Good For?
ComicInfo.Summary:
Our Little Secret: A member of an all-female interstellar freighter crew finds a male stowaway aboard ship. Rather than turn him in, she decides to have sex with him.
Web Of Deceit: Barbarian freebooter Irene the Black plots to snare a treasure guarded by a gigantic spider.
Hidden Talent: Deanna has heard rumors about the sexual prowess of certain species and decides to test the theories out with nebbish store clerk Irwin.
Power: What's It Good For?: Laura and Melody discuss what Laura should do with her supernatural powers and with the rest of her life.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:26:51. [Issue ID 248485]
ComicInfo.Characters: Doc,Tina Felina,Captain Gina Felina,unidentified crew member,The Stowaway,chief engineer
